name: BBCWorld
text:
Many of us have been working from home since March

Our relationship with the office has changed, perhaps forever

üè¢ If and when we go back to the office what will it look like?
üíª How will technology and coronavirus change the way offices work?

[Thread]
https://t.co/8V0hCnXzUV

name: BBCWorld
text:
ü§í Infrared temperature checks
‚ÜïÔ∏è Contactless lifts
üì≤ New apps to spread workers out & keep surfaces clean

Some companies have been thinking about changing the way offices function

But what would a day look like in one of these new offices?

https://t.co/8V0hCnXzUV https://t.co/pIjqgpEnr3

name: BBCWorld
text:
You might start the day by check your building's app, says David Garten from RXR Realty 

Apps could look at certain things to assess risk:
üå¨Ô∏è Air quality
üî¢ Number of occupants
üîÉ How well social distancing is being observed

https://t.co/8V0hCnXzUV https://t.co/aPjRGH96Cw

name: BBCWorld
text:
When you arrive you could go through an infrared temperature-screening system says James Lawrence, of design and architecture firm Gensler 

One company which makes crowd thermal cameras says they‚Äôve seen demand increase 700% 

https://t.co/8V0hCnXzUV https://t.co/cQD6CHMTsW

name: BBCWorld
text:
If your temperature is safe:

‚ÜïÔ∏è Your lift might be operated with buttons on your office‚Äôs app, or a contactless card
üßπ You might use an app to check when your workstation was last cleaned

https://t.co/8V0hCnXzUV https://t.co/mCHZEQ4EBT

name: BBCWorld
text:
üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏èüë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è You may not be sitting where you used to

Software can create floor plans to calculate safe bubbles around each worker, working out different ways to place staff so their bubbles do not overlap, keeping people apart to stop the spread of the virus

https://t.co/8V0hCnXzUV https://t.co/SBNNyUAowB

name: BBCWorld
text:
You also need to keep track of the surfaces people used, says Matt Calkins from Appian:

"You know where best to send your deep cleaning team, and maximise use of your bleach, ethanol and wipes" üßΩüßº
